Scroll breaker

Process

The technology on our devices can be addictive, as discussed here. However, as discussed here, we can choose to use these technologies in ways that break addictive cycles and shape the technologies for the better.

Scroll breaker is designed to help us do this. Its messages, which were generated with the help of ChatGPT (OpenAI), promote awareness and intention. Follow Scroll breaker on X and Bluesky!

Influences: Fear by Thich Nhat Hanh, work by Jonathan Haidt, work by Jonathan Stray
